views.markdown:
- Rewrote the core functions of BlurBar for reliability and efficiency - Optimized and reimplemented the show/hide feature for stability - Redesigned the preferences pane for clarity and beauty - Overall simplification and reworking to support all versions of iOS 7 - Added Activator support
- Added Help section
- Added more refined features
- Optimized
- iPad support! Sorry about that.
- Adjustments! Change whatever you want in Settings.

Thanks for all the feedback, I'm glad you're all happy with BlurBar! Make sure to hit the new "share" button in the Settings area if you love it.

Better blur (think Navigation Bar), fixed blur size bug (sorry!)
